dlg.text: Select a town to call for reinforcements:

error.wrongTarget: You can only summon creatures from the town.

description.0:
{Reinforcements}

Hero can summon creatures from the closest town garrison once per day.
description.1:
{Basic Reinforcements}

Hero can summon creatures from the closest town garrison up to 2 times per day.
description.2:
{Advanced Reinforcements}

Hero can summon creatures from any town garrison up to 3 times per day.
description.3:
{Expert Reinforcements}

Hero can summon creatures from any town garrison up to 4 times per day.
